test.instr: (:ins (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X cupboard) (type X container))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X washmachine) (type X container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y television))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort 5 microwave) (type Y container))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X cupboard))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave) (type X container))) )
test.nl: Open the cupboard. Open the washmachine. Put the can on the television. Take out the yellow remotecontrol from the microwave. The cupboard is closed. The microwave is opened.
